senses.sense_definition: A keyboard, especially one belonging to a musical instrument.

examples.text: The antique organ features a beautifully preserved <w>claviature</w> made of ivory and wood.
He carefully cleaned the dust from the <w>claviature</w> before beginning to play.

senses.sense_definition: The specific arrangement or layout of keys on a musical keyboard.

examples.text: Musicians must often adapt their technique to the specific <w>claviature</w> of historical instruments.
The <w>claviature</w> of this synthesizer is designed to facilitate complex chord progressions.

senses.sense_definition: A method or style of positioning and using the fingers on a keyboard.

examples.text: Her precise <w>claviature</w> allows her to execute rapid scales with remarkable clarity.
The music teacher corrected the student's <w>claviature</w> to prevent strain during practice.

senses.sense_definition: A comprehensive range, repertoire, or toolkit of resources and concepts available for use in a specific field.

examples.text: The diplomat utilized a whole <w>claviature</w> of negotiation tactics to reach an agreement.
This software provides designers with a wide <w>claviature</w> of creative tools.
